org.osgeo.mapguide

Class MgDateTime

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgObject
      • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgDisposable
        • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgGuardDisposable
          • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgSerializable
            • org.osgeo.mapguide.MgDateTime

  • public class MgDateTime
extends MgSerializable
    MgDateTime is used to store dates, times, or both.

      • validate

        public void validate()
        Validates the date time value. This method should be called after the date time value has been fully specified by Set methods.

      • isDate

        public boolean isDate()
        Determines if this object only represents a date value.
        Returns:
        Returns true if only the date is valid; otherwise returns false.

      • isTime

        public boolean isTime()
        Determines if this object only represents a time value.
        Returns:
        Returns true if only the time is valid; otherwise returns false.

      • isDateTime

        public boolean isDateTime()
        Determines if this object represents both date and time values.
        Returns:
        Returns true if both the date and time are valid; otherwise returns false.
